panel.html:
Data slider
Sometimes you want to display a lot of data, but you don't want to display all of them at the same time. You can use the data slider to display only a part of the data. We used the following code for this: dataZoom: [ { type: 'slider', show: true, xAxisIndex: [0], start: 1, end: 35 }, { start: 80, type: "inside" } ],
Note that the first configuration is for the slider on the bottom. The second one is used to zoom into the data points when using the mousewheel. See more options in the ECharts documentation.
